uturns.title: Winter Fuel Payment
uturns.reversal: Means-tested to Pension Credit recipients only
uturns.secondReversal: Expanded to all pensioners earning under ¬£35,000
uturns.summary: Cut payments to 10 million pensioners, then partially restored after massive backlash and by-election defeat.

uturns.title: Two-Child Benefit Cap
uturns.summary: Suspended 7 MPs for voting to scrap it, then scrapped it themselves 16 months later.

uturns.title: Farm Inheritance Tax
uturns.summary: Faced tractor protests and rural revolt before significantly raising the threshold.

uturns.title: PIP Disability Payments
uturns.originalPolicy: Major cuts to Personal Independence Payments
uturns.summary: 126 Labour MPs signed amendment to block cuts; government backed down before vote.

uturns.title: Mandatory Digital ID
uturns.originalPolicy: Compulsory digital ID for right-to-work checks
uturns.reversal: Made optional with alternative documents accepted
uturns.summary: PM said we need to know who is in our country, then scrapped the mandatory requirement.

uturns.title: Grooming Gangs Inquiry
uturns.originalPolicy: Refused national inquiry, focus on existing recommendations
uturns.reversal: Announced statutory inquiry led by Baroness Longfield
uturns.summary: Resisted for months amid Elon Musk attacks, then announced ¬£65m three-year inquiry.

uturns.title: WASPI Compensation
uturns.originalPolicy: Signalled support for 1950s women pension compensation
uturns.summary: Accepted maladministration finding but rejected ¬£10.5bn compensation as unjustified.

uturns.title: National Insurance Threshold Freeze
uturns.originalPolicy: Promised not to increase taxes on working people
uturns.reversal: Extended threshold freeze for three more years
uturns.summary: Claimed freezing thresholds isn't the same as raising rates. Fiscal wordplay at its finest.

uturns.title: Pub Business Rates
uturns.originalPolicy: Major hike in business rates for hospitality
uturns.reversal: Preparing support package for pub industry
uturns.summary: Outcry over impact on struggling pubs forced Treasury to prepare relief package.

uturns.title: Day-One Employment Rights
uturns.originalPolicy: Promised protection from unfair dismissal from day one
uturns.reversal: Delayed and watered down amid business concerns
uturns.summary: Key manifesto pledge quietly shelved after lobbying from business groups.

uturns.title: Fiscal Rules on Debt
uturns.originalPolicy: Strict fiscal rules on debt measurement
uturns.reversal: Changed rules to allow ¬£50bn more borrowing
uturns.summary: Invented new way to measure debt to unlock more borrowing. Modern monetary creativity.

uturns.title: Trans Rights Definition
uturns.originalPolicy: Trans women are women, that is the law
uturns.reversal: A woman is an adult female, court made that clear
uturns.summary: Pre-PM position abandoned after Supreme Court ruling on legal definition of woman.

uturns.title: Employer NI Contributions
uturns.originalPolicy: Promised not to raise National Insurance
uturns.reversal: Raised employer NI by 2 percentage points
uturns.summary: Claimed employer NI isn't the same as employee NI. The semantics were strong with this one.
